mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Crosman, George H., Jr.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Maj Geo. S. Trimble Camp Carlile Wheeling Aug 23 1861. By Telegraph from Grafton " " 1861. Special order No 11. Capt G S Trimble 1 Va Volunteer Infantry will proceed without delay to Parkersburg thence to Spencer and muster into the United-States service for three 3 years the home guards there with the understanding that unless from urgent necessity they will not be called on to serve out of Western Virginia by command of Brigadier Genl Kelley Geo H. Crossman Jr Asst Adjt Genl 60Gr1.85pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Crosman, George H., Jr.
Grafton, (West) Virginia
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Trimble, George S.
